Who: RODIMUS PRIME, Kup, Nightlight/?
Location: Black Fortress - Hallways

> She didnt know who really was. She started to feel tired, unexplained tired,
> as if she handt slept in several days. she had to hold a piper in order to
> avoid fell but he couldnt be stand up for so long. A chorus of voices arouse
> in her head while her vision became blurry. She couldnt fight that feeling
> for so long.
>
> Kup emerged from a corritor holding his dart gun looking to Nightlight and
> later to Rodimus said in low voice "Forgive me... i beg your fogiveness but
> i cant let her escape... Time is short... She will sleep a while... we can
> reprogram her... and then she will understand all... "

Rodiums looked as the woman he loved slumped over. He reached down and
grabbed her before she hit the ground, and gently lifted her in his
arms, the movement seemingly effortless as he looked over at Kup.

Noting the weapon Kup had was not a blaster but a stun gun, and
remembering the strange way Nightlight had acted he though that this
might had been the best way. But he couldn't help but feel a stab of
anger as he glanced down at Nightlight as she lay unconscious in his
arms.

As Kup took left to help Tuscon, Rodimus followed as it was also in
the direction that led out of this place. Rodimus couldn't ever
remember wanting to leave place so bad as he wanted to leave this
black fortress of Hydras'!

(TBC)

Preston
